## ModelAttributeSpec.buffer property

Backing `WebGLArrayBuffer` instance. Usually this will be auto-initialized by `compileBuffers()`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
buffer?: IWebGLBuffer<AttribBufferData>;
```
